behavior.name: Demo za EMO
behavior.author: Rok Pahic, Boris Kuster, Mihael Simonic, Matija Mavsar
behavior.description:
Potrebna oprema:
bambus-1.local: roslaunch controllers raspi-panda1-block.local: docker raspi-clamp-block.local: docker
Opis: - Preberi pozicijo HCA iz kamere - Poberi z Qb hand - Daj v primez - Stisni in zavrti tja in nazaj - Spusti primez - Poberi z robotm - Odlozi nazaj na zacetek - Ponovi
